```{r}
library(readxl)


data <- read.csv('ppg2008.csv')
data
```



```{r}
library(RColorBrewer)

row.names(data) <- data$Name
data <- data[,2:20]


matrix <- data.matrix(data)


nba_heatmap <- heatmap(matrix, Rowv = NA, Colv = NA, scale= 'column')
nba_heatmap

```

```{r}

library(ggplot2)
library(ggspatial)
library(geometry)
library(ggmap)

data <- read.csv('costcos-geocoded.csv')
data


ggplot() + geom_spatial_point(data = data, aes(x = data$Longitude, y = data$Latitude))




```



```{r}

data$z <- data$Latitude**2 + data$Longitude**2

data$z <- data$Latitude + data$Longitude

fig <- plot_ly(x = data$Longitude, y = data$Latitude,z = data$z, type = "contour")

fig

```
